alert.note: Alert for White Pine County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 12 at 2:45PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern White Pine County through 315 PM PDT... At 245 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Schellbourne, moving southwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Heavy rainfall along with gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Schellbourne. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
